# <a name="change-your-language-date-and-time-format-or-time-zone-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="917a3-102">Promena jezika, formata datuma i vremena ili vremenske zone u programu Outlook na Webu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="917a3-102">Change your language, date and time format, or time zone in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="917a3-103">Na vrhu stranice izaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="917a3-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="917a3-104">**Postavke** > **prikazuju sve postavke programa Outlook**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="917a3-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="917a3-105">Izaberite **Opšti** > **jezik i vreme**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="917a3-105">Select **General** > **Language and time**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="917a3-106">Izaberite jezik koji želite da koristite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="917a3-106">Select the language you want to use.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="917a3-107">Kliknite na dugme **Sačuvaj**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="917a3-107">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="917a3-108">Da biste saznali više o tome, pogledajte odeljak [Promena vremenske zone i jezičkih postavki u programu Outlook na vebu](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="917a3-108">To learn more, see [Change the time zone and language settings in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span></span>
